snippet: The American Medical Association responds to a news article, “House and Senate at Impasse on Medicare Payments.”
abstract: Peter W Carmel, president of the American Medical Association, responds to Feb 7 article describing Congress's deadlock over how to prevent deep cuts in Medicare payments to doctors.
lead_paragraph: The American Medical Association responds to a news article, “House and Senate at Impasse on Medicare Payments.”
